title: "Indigenous voice to parliament: Say Yes to embrace future of hope for our First Nations"
excerpt: "With the date of the referendum set, many Australians are now turning their attention to the choice they will make in just six weeks. On October 14, Australians will be asked a simple question: Do you support a change to the Constitution to recognise the First Peoples of Australia by establishing an Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander voice?"
